objects.specification: A flat interior wall with a bright neutral white finish, smooth surface and minimal texture. It is rectangular, spans the full width of the room, has thin profile, and is painted in a bright off-white tone to create a clean, engaging learning environment.

A flat interior wall with a bright neutral white finish, smooth surface and minimal texture. It is rectangular, spans the full width of the room, has thin profile, and is painted in a bright off-white tone to create a clean, engaging learning environment.

A flat interior wall with a bright neutral white finish, smooth surface and minimal texture. It is rectangular, spans the full depth of the room, has thin profile, and is painted in a bright off-white tone to create a clean, engaging learning environment.

A flat interior wall with a bright neutral white finish, smooth surface and minimal texture. It is rectangular, spans the full depth of the room, has thin profile, and is painted in a bright off-white tone to create a clean, engaging learning environment.
A flat floor surface with a smooth light gray tile texture and subtle reflective finish. It spans the full room footprint and provides a durable, cleanable surface for a classroom environment.

A standard student desk featuring a light wood tabletop with rounded corners, four straight tapered legs, and an integrated modesty panel. The wood finish is a natural light oak tone with smooth varnish, designed for stability and a comfortable writing surface.

A standard student chair with a light wood seat and backrest, tubular metal frame, curved ergonomic back support, and a cushioned seat pad upholstered in a complementary steel-blue fabric. Designed for medium-height students with stable, non-slip feet.

A large teacher's desk in a rich dark walnut finish, rectangular top with beveled edges, sturdy thick legs, and two under-surface drawers. The design conveys professionalism and offers ample workspace for teaching materials.

A comfortable executive chair with dark wood accents, high backrest, contoured cushions, leather-like upholstery in deep charcoal, and chrome armrests. Designed for prolonged seating comfort during lectures.

A large rectangular dry-erase whiteboard with glossy white surface, thin aluminum frame, and hidden mounting rails. Sized for clear visibility from all student desks, with smooth write/erase performance.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in metallic silver finish with ventilation grilles, lens housing, and mounting bracket. Designed to project crisply onto the front whiteboard for presentations.

A tall wooden bookshelf in warm chestnut finish, five evenly spaced shelves filled with multicolored books of varying sizes. The back panel is solid, and the shelves are sturdy for classroom materials.
A circular analog wall clock with black frame, white face, bold black numerals and red second hand. Designed for easy readability at eye level.
A tall potted plant with glossy green leaves, slender trunk, and simple terracotta pot. Provides decorative natural accent and calming atmosphere.
A tall potted plant with glossy green leaves, slender trunk, and simple terracotta pot. Provides decorative natural accent and calming atmosphere.
A large rectangular glass window with clear panes, slim white frame, and operable sliding mechanism. Allows abundant natural light into the classroom.
A pleated fabric curtain in soft goldenrod tone, semi-opaque, with stitched header and hidden hooks. Sized to cover the window fully when drawn.
A pleated fabric curtain in soft goldenrod tone, semi-opaque, with stitched header and hidden hooks. Sized to cover the window fully when drawn.
A small cylindrical waste bin in dark gray plastic with open top, smooth surface, and non-slip base. Conveniently placed for paper disposal.
A small cylindrical waste bin in dark gray plastic with open top, smooth surface, and non-slip base. Conveniently placed for paper disposal.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, vibrant colors and large readable text, framed in slim black profile. Designed to convey key learning concepts in an engaging layout.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, vibrant colors and large readable text, framed in slim black profile. Designed to convey key learning concepts in an engaging layout.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, vibrant colors and large readable text, framed in slim black profile. Designed to convey key learning concepts in an engaging layout.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, vibrant colors and large readable text, framed in slim black profile. Designed to convey key learning concepts in an engaging layout.
A recessed circular LED ceiling light in matte white housing, diffuser lens, low profile. Provides bright, even illumination for classroom spaces.
A recessed circular LED ceiling light in matte white housing, diffuser lens, low profile. Provides bright, even illumination for classroom spaces.
A recessed circular LED ceiling light in matte white housing, diffuser lens, low profile. Provides bright, even illumination for classroom spaces.
